messages.message:
Hi team,
We have been working on building a marketplace app on aihub.instabase.com (http://aihub.instabase.com). @Anshu and I were discussing a couple of points on how we can improve the user experience for AIHub apps.
1. *Schema*: For example, if you want to use the passport app, you first open the app from the hub, then click on _App Info_ and finally on _Schema_. While this process only takes a few clicks, can this be improved further for better user experience ?
2. *Validation*: Currently, there is no easy way to view the validations implemented for a specific app unless you have access to the _Build_ project. It would be helpful to have a section similar to _Schema_ where users can easily see all the validations in place, without needing build access.
cc : @Nithin @Swathy N
Have we raised a PFR with the relevant oinfo?
@jack.robbins assigned EPD-2817 Improve User Accessibility for Schema and Validation Details in AIH… from @Anshu ⟶ @jack.robbins

We'll be addressing #1 soon (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-1970), but would need to do more design thinking to show the validations in a easy to understand format.

Mind if we circle back for feedback once we prioritize that? Probably after we launch Case Management, as that comes with some new validation features.
